name: Reentrant Queueing System

version-history.notes: Replaced query property `PminBothQueuesFull´ by probability-one assertion property `PminBothQueuesFullIsOne´.

author: Michaela Klauck <klauck@depend.uni-saarland.de>
description: A queueing system with a left and a right queue of capacity `C_LEFT´ and `C_RIGHT´, respectively. Jobs of `JOB_TYPES´ different types arrive into the left and right queues, where they are stored until they start being processed by the left or right service desk, respectively. When a job is completed at the left service desk, it may re-enter the right queue. The original model was translated from a MAPA file.

parameters.name: TIME_BOUND
parameters.description: The time bound for property PminBothQueuesFullBound

properties.name: PminBothQueuesFullIsOne
properties.description: The minimum probability that both queues are full is one.

properties.name: TminBothQueuesFull
properties.description: The minimum expected time until both queues are full.

properties.name: TmaxBothQueuesFull
properties.description: The maximum expected time until both queues are full.

properties.name: PmaxBothQueuesFullBound
properties.description: The maximum probability that both queues are full within the TIME-BOUND.

properties.name: SmaxBothQueuesFull
properties.description: Long-run probability that both queues are full.
